fields.physical_description:
Design: card printed in simple colours to who illustrations of men, women and children; reverse side shows two children and woman with city and rural views in blue
No. of cards: 44
No. illustrated: all
fields.title: vacuation; The most amusing ever card game. ENTERED AT STATIONERS' HALL.  ALL DESIGNS COPYRIGHT
fields.history_note: Emphasis is made of showing the children with the gas mask boxes or the masks themselves.  Many of the names are puns.
fields.historical_context_note:
No. of Players: two or more
Equipment required: 44 cards arranged in 2 sets of 12, 2 sets of 5, one set of 8, with two single cards.
booklet of rules
original box, printed in simple colours.

Rules:
INSTRUCTIONS AND RULES FOR THE VACUATION CARD GAME
For two or more players.  Use two packs if more than five players.

The pack contains 44 cards, made up as follows:-
12 G Girl Cards
12 B Boy Cards
8   H Householder Cards
5  T Teacher Cards
5  M Master Cards
1  A Alarm Card
1  E Extra Gas Mask Card

The object of the game is to complete evacuation by getting rid of every card in the hand.  When one player has done this the others count up the value of the cards left in their hands and the player with the lowest number of points after one player's total has reached 100 points or more, is the winner.  If preferred, a large total, say 200 points may be agreed to make a longer game.

DEAL
Shuffle the pack and deal one at a time face up until the Alarm card is delat.  This player becomes the first dealer.
For two or three players deal six cards each.
For four or five players deal five cards each.
For more than five players, two packs should be used, dealing six cards to each.
The cards remaining are placed face down in the centre of the table.  Player onleft of dealer starts by playing any card from his hand.  The next covers it with a card bearing the same initial letter, ie G,B,T or H.  If unable to do this he must take the top card from the centre stack, but cannot play this card until next in turn.  the next player follows in the same manner.  The MASTER cards (M) can be played at any turn and the player laying down one must declar which of the four initials (G,B,T or H) shall be played next.  The following player must play the initial declared or pick up from the centre stack, as previously explained.
There are two special cards in the pack, A or ALARM and E EXTRA GAS MASK.  These are played as follows:-
A - This can be played by any player when in turn but only upon a Householder (H) card and when doing so he calls ALARM.  All other players must then take one card from the centre stack.  After the A card has been played the next in turn continues with any card from his hand.
E - This gives an extra turn and is the only occasion when a player can lay down two cards at one turn.  This E card must be played on to a Teacher card and player then follows, at the same time, with any other card except A from his hand
Should the face down centre stack become exhausted the cards that his been played are then turned face down and players continue to pick from this stack.
When a round finishes the player left with either the Extra Gas Mask or Alarm card loses twenty points for each of these two cards additional to the totalof the other cards held.  All other cards count five points against the hold with the exception of the Master cards - ten points are lost for each M card held when one player has evacuated by clearing out all his cards.
NOTE:-  No player is compelled to play even if able to do so at any time during play, should he prefer to draw an extra card from the centre stack.  Drawing a card, however, completes a turn and no card can be laid down until next in turn to play.
MADE IN ENGLAND.

A - AIR RAID ALARM, whistle blowing 
E - EXTRA GAS MASK, gas mask
M - M EVACUEE JUDY JINKS, girl dressed as nurse with doll
     M EVACUEE MICK MUDD, boy in boots
     M EVACUEE MONA MUDD, girl sitting in puddle, crying 
     M TEACHER, MR. MATHS
     M HOUSEHOLDER, SQUIRE SQUIRT
H - HOUSEHOLDER, BRAWNY THE SMITH
                                 CHOPS THE BUTCHER
                                 FARMER WUZZLE
                                 KETCHAM THE KEEPER
                                 OLD GARGE
                                 RIP SAW THE CARPENTER
                                 S. ALT THE GROCER
                                 SIMMY THE SHEPHERD
G - EVACUEE - ANNIE ACORN, BETTY BUTTER, CONNIE CHUCK, DOLLY DUCK, FANNY FUZZY, GERTIE GUGGLE, HILDA HOWLER, IDA ITTINEM,KATIE KETTLE, LUCY LARD, , NANCY NITWIT, POLLY PUFFER
B - EVACUEE - BERTIE BUTTER, CHARLIE CHUCK, DANNY DUCK, EDDY EARWIG, GEORGIE GUGGLE, HERBY HOWLER, ISSY ITTINEM, JOHNNY JINKS, KENNY KETTLE, LENNY LARD, NOBBY NITWIT, PERCY PUFFER
T - TEACHER, MR. AL. GEBRA
                      OLD G. O'METRY
                      MISS PRIM
                     SNIGGY SNAGG
                      MR. TANNER
